description.value:
Space Marines Only. Blood Angels Relic. Innately Master Crafted. Used as part of a Ritual of Vision by a Blood Angel. Often filled with Scarlet Sacramental Wine. When imbibed grants +10 to WS, BS, and Skill Tests, as well as Unnatural Perception x2 for 1 Hour. May also cause visions of the future.

Requirements

Excessive use has dire consequences. Exclusive to the Blood Angels.

Effect: Hero

Notes: 70 R
